actions.name: CancelFHIRExportJobWithDelete
actions.description: Grants permission to cancel an on going FHIR Export job with Delete

actions.name: CreateFHIRDatastore
actions.description: Grants permission to create a datastore that can ingest and export FHIR data

actions.name: CreateResource
actions.description: Grants permission to create resource

actions.name: DeleteFHIRDatastore
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a datastore

actions.name: DeleteResource
actions.description: Grants permission to delete resource

actions.name: DescribeFHIRDatastore
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with the FHIR datastore, including the datastore ID, datastore ARN, datastore name, datastore status, created at, datastore type version, and datastore endpoint

actions.name: DescribeFHIRExportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to display the properties of a FHIR export job, including the ID, ARN, name, and the status of the datastore

actions.name: DescribeFHIRExportJobWithGet
actions.description: Grants permission to display the properties of a FHIR export job, including the ID, ARN, name, and the status of the datastore with Get

actions.name: DescribeFHIRImportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to display the properties of a FHIR import job, including the ID, ARN, name, and the status of the datastore

actions.name: GetCapabilities
actions.description: Grants permission to get the capabilities of a FHIR datastore

actions.name: ListFHIRDatastores
actions.description: Grants permission to list all FHIR datastores that are in the user's account, regardless of datastore status

actions.name: ListFHIRExportJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of export jobs for the specified datastore

actions.name: ListFHIRImportJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of import jobs for the specified datastore

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of tags for the specified datastore

actions.name: ReadResource
actions.description: Grants permission to read resource

actions.name: SearchEverything
actions.description: Grants permission to search all resources related to a patient

actions.name: SearchWithGet
actions.description: Grants permission to search resources with GET method

actions.name: SearchWithPost
actions.description: Grants permission to search resources with POST method

actions.name: StartFHIRExportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to begin a FHIR Export job

actions.name: StartFHIRExportJobWithPost
actions.description: Grants permission to begin a FHIR Export job with Post

actions.name: StartFHIRImportJob
actions.description: Grants permission to begin a FHIR Import job

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to a datastore

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags associated with a datastore

actions.name: UpdateResource
actions.description: Grants permission to update resource
